title: In 'The Drop,' Mob Bosses Bully Sad Characters At A Bar In Brooklyn
teaser: The film based on Dennis Lehane's short story Animal Rescue is supposed be a thriller, but the narrative doesn't have much urgency. The reason it's worth seeing? James Gandolfini is at his peak.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
